definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)

pinyin: dui4 yi3 xian1 an1 ji1 fen1

sentences.english: Deordorizer distillates are one of main materials for tocopherol.
sentences.chinese: 油脂脫臭餾出物是生產天然生育酚的好原料。

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脫水和發燒可用口服補液鹽和對乙酰氨基酚進行治療。

sentences.english: EVOIL? ALMOND exhibits greater stability over time due to the addition of natural tocopherols.
sentences.chinese: 通過添加天然生育酚，甜杏仁油的穩定性很強。

sentences.english: The influence of content of para-tertiary butyl phenol on solid and performance of coatings is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了對叔丁基酚含量對固含量和塗料性能的影響。

sentences.english: The influence of operation conditions on the degradation of 4-nitrophenol in water by ozone was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了各種操作條件對臭氧降解水中對硝基酚的影響。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the analytical method for cannabinol in the hemp seed oil by means of high-performance liquid chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立火麻仁油中大麻酚的高效液相色譜測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a method for determining contents of emodin and chrysophanol in Yiqing granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一清顆粒中大黃素與大黃酚含量測定的方法。

sentences.english: The contents of emodin and chrysophanol were determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 運用高效液相色譜法測定大黃素和大黃酚的含量。

sentences.english: This very safe agent has taken over from hexachlorophene, which had a tendency to neurotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 這種安全成分來自於雙三氯酚，後者有神經毒性傾向。

sentences.english: Methods The Folin-phenol reagent method was used.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用福林酚試劑法。

sentences.english: Pollution in Type I pond is very serious, especially, the content of phenol in carp far exceed quota.
sentences.chinese: 型塘水質污染相當嚴重，尤其是鯉魚酚含量嚴重超標。

sentences.english: The yield of O-alkylation of 2,5-dimethylphenol with the monohalogen carboxylic esters is above 81%.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯酚與一滷代羧酸酯的反應產率在81%以上。

sentences.english: Tea polyphenols had influences on the properties of bromelain.
sentences.chinese: 酚菠蘿蛋白酶特性影響。

sentences.english: The optimum technological conditions of nonyl phenolic resin modified by rosin have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了壬基酚松香改性酚醛樹脂的工藝條件。

sentences.english: Zinc is not only phenol oxidase in carbonate.
